mapper.select: select * from sanitation_car sc left join sanitation_car_type sct on sc.sct_id=sct.id

SELECT temp.id,temp.sc_number,temp.sct_name,company.c_name FROM (select sc.id,sc.sc_number,sct.sct_name,sc.company_id from sanitation_car sc left join sanitation_car_type sct on sc.sct_id=sct.id) as temp LEFT JOIN company on temp.company_id=company.id
select * from (select sc.id,sc.sc_number,sct.sct_name from sanitation_car sc left join sanitation_car_type sct on sc.sct_id=sct.id) as temp where temp.sct_name like concat("%",#{scType},"%")
